Constructor Detail

Player

Player(String planet,
       String playerName,
       int numberBase,
       String stringYear1,
       String stringYear2,
       String stringYear3)
Default Constructor to create an object of the Player class.

Parameters:
planet - The planet the player is from.
playerName - The name of the player.
numberBase - The number base system the player's home planet uses.
year1 - The number of home runs hit in the player's first year.
year2 - The number of home runs hit in the player's second year.
year3 - The number of home runs hit in the player's third year.
Method Detail

calcAverage

public void calcAverage()
Method that calculates the average number of home runs for a given player. Pre-Condition: The number of home runs for each year MUST be in base 10 (decimal).

getAverage

public int getAverage()
Method that returns the average number of home runs for the player..

Returns:
The average number of home runs the player hits per year (calculated over 3 years).

getName

public String getName()
Method that returns the name of the player.

Returns:
The name of the player.

getPlanet

public String getPlanet()
Method that returns the name of the player's home planet.

Returns:
The name of the player's home planet.

getYear1

public String getYear1()
Method that returns string value of the number of home runs the player hit in their first year.

Returns:
The number of home runs the player got in their first year (in their home planet's number system).

getYear2

public String getYear2()
Method that returns string value of the number of home runs the player hit in their second year.

Returns:
The number of home runs the player got in their second year (in their home planet's number system).

getYear3

public String getYear3()
Method that returns string value of the number of home runs the player hit in their third year.

Returns:
The number of home runs the player got in their third year (in their home planet's number system).

printResults

public abstract void printResults(List<Player> playerList)
Method that prints out the results of the Universal Batting Challenge to the user in each player's own unique number system.

Parameters:
playerList - The list of the players sorted by their average number of home runs (highest to lowest).

setYear1

public void setYear1(int base10)
Method that sets the value of year1 to the base 10 (decimal) number passed to this method.

Parameters:
base10 - The number of home runs hit in the player's first year in base 10.

setYear2

public void setYear2(int base10)
Method that sets the value of year2 to the base 10 (decimal) number passed to this method.

Parameters:
base10 - The number of home runs hit in the player's second year in base 10.

setYear3

public void setYear3(int base10)
Method that sets the value of year3 to the base 10 (decimal) number passed to this method.

Parameters:
base10 - The number of home runs hit in the player's third year in base 10.

toBinary

public String toBinary(int base10)
Method that changes a decimal number into a number in the binary number system.

toDecimal

public abstract void toDecimal()
Method that converts the number of home runs hit each year into base 10 (decimal) and initialises the "int" value for each respetive string. Nothing is returned.

toDuodecimal

public String toDuodecimal(int base10)
Method that changes a decimal number into a number in the duodecimal number system.

toHexidecimal

public String toHexidecimal(int base10)
Method that changes a decimal number into a number in the hexidecimal number system.

Method that changes a decimal number into a number in the hexitridecimal number system.

Method that changes a decimal number into a number in the octal number system.

toVigesimal

Method that changes a decimal number into a number in the vigesimal number system.
